groups.name: bubble.data.doris
groups.description: Configuration properties for Apache Doris integration.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Doris integration.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.fe-host
properties.description: Doris FE host address.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.fe-http-port
properties.description: Doris FE HTTP port for StreamLoad.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.fe-query-port
properties.description: Doris FE query port for MySQL protocol.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.username
properties.description: Username for Doris authentication.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.password
properties.description: Password for Doris authentication.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.database
properties.description: Default database name.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.pool.max-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum number of connections in the pool.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.pool.min-idle
properties.description: Minimum number of idle connections in the pool.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.pool.max-lifetime
properties.description: Maximum lifetime of a connection in milliseconds.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.pool.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.pool.idle-timeout
properties.description: Maximum amount of time that a connection is allowed to sit idle in the pool in milliseconds.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.max-retries
properties.description: Maximum number of retries for StreamLoad operations.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.retry-interval-ms
properties.description: Interval between retries in milliseconds.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.timeout-ms
properties.description: Timeout for StreamLoad operations in milliseconds.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.max-batch-rows
properties.description: Maximum number of rows per batch for StreamLoad.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.max-batch-size-bytes
properties.description: Maximum batch size in bytes for StreamLoad.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.default-format
properties.description: Default format for StreamLoad (json or csv).

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.strip-outer-array
properties.description: Whether to strip outer array for JSON format.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.column-separator
properties.description: Column separator for CSV format.

properties.name: bubble.data.doris.stream-load.line-delimiter
properties.description: Line delimiter for CSV format.
